title: Clarity
body:
I know that sometimes the clarity is a little off, like when the death recap says a champion's basic attacks did true damage as well as physical damage, or when Elise only used 1 damage source on me and thunderlords went off.
but this is something else entirely... Literally Nothing in it makes sense.
I got an assist on myself whilst being a turret, by dealing 189 true damage to myself as magic damage....

i know its probably trying to tell me something about what happened.. (probably something useful, about how i died).. 

but.. but.. i just cant even begin to fathom what its trying to tell me....

Clarity.

replies.body:
This is definitely something that should be fixed. 

Death Recap is vital for determining defensive builds, and its current state, it is in is likely the reason for defensive builds being so plain in some cases (Deadman's and Frozen Heart being built far too often).

There's not much of a solution to this right now. The best thing you can do is get a visual death recap program, like the one **Sneaky** from Cloud 9 has, check it out [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UMENwH_n0q0).

It's an Overwolf add on if you're interested in downloading it. Not against current terms of service to my knowledge as well, since it doesn't [directly interact](http://lolwiz.gg/new/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/riot_forumj_response.png) with the client.
